name: Telegram Bot
description: A Telegram bot based on Pyrogram.

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

AUTHORIZED_CHATS.description: should be an integer. The ID of the Telegram Group, where the Mirror leech should work.
AUTHORIZED_CHATS.value: For multiple IDs, use space between telegram chat IDs

OWNER_ID.description: should be an integer. ID of owner of bot

GDRIVE_FOLDER_ID.description: This is the folder ID of the Google Drive Folder to which you want to upload all the mirrors.
GDRIVE_FOLDER_ID.value: Drive folder ID in which you are uploading

QB_SEED.description: Make it true if you Want to seed torrents.

DOWNLOAD_DIR.description: The path to the local folder where the downloads should be downloaded to.

AUTO_DELETE_MESSAGE_DURATION.description: Interval of time (in seconds), after which the bot deletes it's message (and command message) which is expected to be viewed instantly. Note: Set to -1 to never automatically delete messages.

USE_SERVICE_ACCOUNTS.description: Make it True if you are using Service accounts.

BASE_URL_OF_BOT.description: Web Link, Required for Heroku to avoid sleep or use worker if you don't want to use web (selection)

STOP_DUPLICATE.description: Make it true if you want to Stop mirror Same file/folder multiple times.

CRYPT.description: Crypt id, used to clone/leech gdtot links
CRYPT.value: Get it from Your gdtot cookies.

SUDO_USERS.description: List of id of sudo users, Separated by space
SUDO_USERS.value: IDs of sudo users # Separated by space

TORRENT_DIRECT_LIMIT.description: Maximum Size of file/folder to clone.

CLONE_LIMIT.description: Maximum Size of file/folder to clone.

VIEW_LINK.description: View Link button to open file Index Link in browser instead of direct download link

IS_TEAM_DRIVE.description: Set to 'True' if GDRIVE_FOLDER_ID is from a Team Drive else False or Leave it empty.

CUSTOM_FILENAME.description: fill with name u want to prefix the file name like ur channel usernameðŸ™Š, keep empty for do nothing, but add to ur config vars even without input.
